Name: Yellow Submarine
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0째Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. Special Ingredient #1 - Yellow Juice with 2 parts yellow beetroot to 1 part yellow bell pepper and 1 part yellow tomato Special Ingredient #2 - Pepper Falernum made with 1 chile de arbol, 1 jalapeno and 1 bottle Velvet Falernum. Coarsely chop 1 chile de arbol and 1 jalapeno and infuse with a bottle of velvet falernum for 3 days. Strain and re-bottle. Special Ingredient #3 - Pink Saline Solution. Combine 5 parts water to 1 part Himalayan pink salt. Stir to dissolve and store in a dropper bottle.
History: Created in 2016 by Gui Jaroschy, Bars Director for Freehand Hotel and Bar Lab for Patr처n Tequila at London Cocktail Week.
Nutrition: One serving of Yellow Submarine contains 140 calories
Garnish: Rim glass with fine ground dried parsley and Himalayan salt. Garnish with yellow beet pickles.
